skills.skill: System design, data structures, and algorithms
Verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and deploy frontend and backend services with a focus on high availability, low latency, and scalability.
Lead and assist in designing, developing, documenting, testing, and debugging new and existing software systems and/or applications.
Identify and resolve defects of complex scope using proper engineering tools and techniques.
Provide support and maintain existing products and add new features as requested by customers.
Collaborate and communicate with Stakeholders, Product Owners, Quality Assurance, and other teams in an agile work environment.
Mentor junior and mid-level engineers by providing advice, coaching, and educational opportunities to grow their technical skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering from an accredited college or university or equivalent work experience.
